channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 德克萨斯州当局说，他们已经找到了 11 岁的奥德丽-坎宁安（Audrii Cunningham）的尸体。
item.description:
Authorities in Texas said they have found the body of 11-year-old Audrii Cunningham, who went missing last week while on her way to school
cnn.it/48qpDAm

item.title: 检察官称，在堪萨斯城超级碗庆祝活动后发生的致命枪击案中，两名男子被指控犯有谋杀罪
item.description: Two men have been charged with murder in the fatal shooting after Kansas City's Super Bowl celebration, prosecutors say cnn.it/49kfmqI

item.title: 美国计划宣布新的重大制裁措施，以追究普京对阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼之死和俄罗斯乌克兰战争的责任
item.description: US plans to announce major new sanctions to hold Putin accountable for the death of Alexey Navalny and Russia's war in Ukraine cnn.it/3UIzDBP

item.title: 美国否决呼吁立即在加沙停火的联合国决议，此前曾提议暂时停止战斗
item.description: US vetoes a UN resolution calling for immediate ceasefire in Gaza after earlier proposing a temporary halt in fighting cnn.com/2024/02/20/politics/…

item.title: Capital One 表示将以 353 亿美元的价格收购发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services），从而使该银行在竞争激烈的信用卡市场中占据一席之地。
item.description: Capital One says it's acquiring Discover Financial Services for $35.3 billion, giving the bank a leg up in the competitive credit card market cnn.it/42Kt2Zn

item.title: 发言人称，俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗体至少在 14 天内不会归还家人
item.description: Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny's body will not be returned to his family for at least 14 days, spokesperson says cnn.it/42ItQy4

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派人士阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀指责普京杀害了他，并发誓要继续他的工作
item.description: Widow of Russian opposition figure Alexey Navalny accuses Putin of killing him and vows to continue his work cnn.it/48mMvjW

item.title: 明尼苏达州州长表示，明尼苏达州两名警察和一名消防员在明尼阿波利斯郊外处理一起家庭事件后死亡。
item.description: Two Minnesota police officers and a firefighter are dead after responding to a domestic incident outside of Minneapolis, governor says. cnn.it/49lSgzS

item.title: 克里姆林宫批评家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的发言人称，应 "立即 "将其遗体移交给其家人
item.description: Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny's body should be handed over to his family "immediately," his spokesperson says cnn.com/2024/02/17/europe/al…

item.title: 乌克兰武装部队宣布从乌克兰顿涅茨克州重镇阿夫迪耶夫卡撤军。
item.description: Ukrainian Armed Forces have announced a withdrawal from the key town of Avdiivka in the Donetsk region of Ukraine. cnn.it/3uBLyXi

item.title: 法官命令特朗普及其公司在纽约民事欺诈案中支付近 3.55 亿美元
item.description:
Judge orders Trump and his companies to pay nearly $355 million in New York civil fraud case
cnn.com/politics/live-news/t…

item.title: 官员称，在堪萨斯城酋长队集会上开枪后被拘留的两名青少年面临涉枪和拒捕指控
item.description: Two teens who were taken into custody after shooting at Kansas City Chiefs rally face gun-related and resisting arrest charges, officials say cnn.com/2024/02/16/us/kansas…

item.title:
拜登总统说，他认为俄罗斯总统普京应对反对派人士阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的死亡负责。
请关注实时更新：
item.description:
President Biden says he holds Russian President Putin responsible for the death of opposition figure Alexey Navalny.

Follow live updates: cnn.com/europe/live-news/ale…

item.title: 西弗吉尼亚州参议员乔-曼钦（Joe Manchin）周五宣布，他不会参加 2024 年的总统竞选活动
item.description: West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin announced Friday that he will not mount a 2024 campaign for president cnn.com/2024/02/16/politics/…

item.title: 1 月份批发业通胀率的升幅超出预期，使 1 月份的通胀形势更加令人失望
item.description: Wholesale inflation rose more than expected in January, adding to a disappointing inflation picture for the month cnn.com/2024/02/16/economy/u…

item.title: 监狱部门称，被监禁的俄罗斯反对派政治家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼已死亡
item.description: Jailed Russian opposition politician Alexey Navalny is dead, prison service says cnn.it/3SJe7dr

item.title: 爱荷华大学球星凯特琳-克拉克成为美国大学生篮球联赛（NCAA）女子篮球队历史得分王，打破了此前职业生涯总得分 3527 分的纪录
item.description: University of Iowa star Caitlin Clark becomes all-time leading scorer in NCAA women's basketball, beating previous record of 3,527 career points cnn.it/48rTicw

item.title: 希腊首开东正教国家同性婚姻合法化先河
item.description: Greece legalizes same-sex marriage in a first for an Orthodox Christian country cnn.it/3uz8iay

item.title: 前联邦调查局线人被控在总统拜登及其儿子亨特参与与一家乌克兰能源公司的商业交易一事上撒谎。
item.description: Former FBI informant charged with lying about involvement of President Biden and his son Hunter in business dealings with a Ukrainian energy company. cnn.com/2024/02/15/politics/…

item.title: 富尔顿县地方检察官在佐治亚州举行的取消其参与特朗普案资格的听证会上出庭作证。关注实时更新。
item.description: The Fulton County district attorney takes the stand at the hearing over disqualifying her from the Trump case in Georgia. Follow live updates. cnn.com/politics/live-news/t…

item.title: 酋长游行枪击案后，3 人被拘留，其中包括两名青少年。执法人员认为事件源于个人纠纷。
item.description:
Two juveniles are among 3 detained following Chiefs' parade shooting. Law enforcement officials believe the incident stemmed from a personal dispute.
cnn.it/3UFFR5e

item.title: 纽约封口费案法官裁定前总统特朗普将于 3 月 25 日开始接受首次刑事审判
item.description: Judge in New York hush money case rules former President Trump will face his first criminal trial beginning on March 25 cnn.it/48k3Lq4

item.title: 以色列称其特种部队已进入被围困的纳赛尔医院，这是加沙仅存的最大的医疗设施
item.description: Israel says its special forces have entered the besieged Nasser Hospital, the largest remaining functioning medical facility in Gaza cnn.it/3SEi3fp

item.title: 官方数据显示，就在大选前几个月，英国已陷入轻度衰退
item.description: Britain has slipped into mild recession, according to official figures, just months ahead of a general election cnn.it/3I5Lfac

item.title: 警察局长称，酋长超级碗游行后有 20 多人遭到枪击，目前已有三人被拘留。
item.description: More than 20 people were shot following Chiefs Super Bowl parade and three people have been detained, police chief says. cnn.com/2024/02/14/sport/kan…

item.title: 酋长队超级碗游行结束时发生枪击事件，消防部门称已造成一人死亡，至少 14 人受伤
item.description: One person has died and at least 14 are injured after a shooting at the end of the Chiefs' Super Bowl parade, fire department says cnn.it/3uFK1PW

item.title: 前陆军总司令普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）宣称在印尼总统选举中获胜。现在，许多人担心这个国家充满活力的民主制度会倒退回专制统治时期。
item.description: Former army chief Prabowo Subianto is claiming victory in Indonesia's presidential election. Now, many fear a rollback of the nation's vibrant democracy to the days of authoritarian rule. cnn.com/2024/02/14/asia/indo…

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数首次收于 5,000 点以上，这是一个具有里程碑意义的时刻，整个华尔街都弥漫着看涨情绪
item.description: The S&P 500 closes above 5,000 for the first time, a landmark moment as bullish sentiment spreads across Wall Street cnn.it/3SQkvkq

item.title: 马里兰州前州长拉里-霍根（Larry Hogan）表示，他将竞选美国参议员，这为共和党在深蓝州争取翻盘提供了强有力的候选人。
item.description: Former Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan says he's running for US Senate, providing Republicans with a strong candidate in their bid to flip a seat in a deep-blue state. cnn.it/49akDRr

item.title: 蒙大拿州众议员马特-罗森代尔（Matt Rosendale）正式参选参议员，为右翼选民和保守派建制派之间的初选之争埋下伏笔。
item.description: Rep. Matt Rosendale is officially running for Senate in Montana, setting up a primary fight between the right-wing base and conservative establishment. cnn.it/498Dj49
